title: Pumpkin and carrot soup
ingredients: ['20g butter', '1 onion, finely diced', '250g peeled and diced pumpkin', '100g carrots, diced', '2 dessertspoons wholemeal flour', '600ml vegetable stock', '1 teaspoon finely chopped root ginger', '1/4 teaspoon curry powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon raspberry vinegar', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'creme fraiche, to garnish']
